attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: restrict the use by goverment dept's and business's using 0870/0845/0844 Premium Rate Telephone Nos, which are far more expensive than ringing Geographical No's, for example the DVLA are reported to have made an Annual Profit of over £11 Million from drivers ringing the DVLA with Tax & License queries.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
